HOST=WHO IS SHARING ROOM ID,
 PLAYER=WHO IS SHARING USERNAME. 


USERNAME IS KEPT SECRETLY THAT CAN BE SEEN ONLY BY THE ADMIN AND PLAYER… HOST CAN SEE ONLY AFTER ENTERING INTO THE GAME…

 AFTER ENTERING IN TO THE GAME IF ANY OF THE PLAYER LEFT HE IS LOST,EVEN LEFT HAPPENED BECAUSE OF NET ISSUE, LOW BATTERY, SUDDEN BACKUP,HANGING ,AUTOMATIC LEFT ETC…..

IF ANY DISPUTE ARRAISES BETWEEN TWO PLAYERS REGARDING GAME WIN, LOSS, CANCEL ..BASED ON THE SCREENSHOT SHARED BY THE WINNER,ADMIN WILL TAKE A ACTION AGAINST THAT DISPUTE...


 ADMIN CAN VERIFY BY MATCHING CODE SHARED BY THE HOST AND USERNAME SHARED BY THE PLAYER...
